document.full_text: puerto rico's miguel cotto stopped nicaraguan challenger ricardo mayorga in the 12th and final round to retain his wba super welterweight title on saturday.
document.title: cotto stops mayorga in 12th round to defend title
lines_and_colors: puerto rico's miguel cotto stopped nicaraguan challenger ricardo mayorga in the 12th and final round to retain his wba super welterweight title on saturday.
